snippet: One industry index, Eurekahedge, said hedge funds were up 4.3 percent through the end of February and that returns were as good in the first two months of 2012 as they had been in 12 years.
abstract: One industry index, Eurekahedge, said hedge funds were up 4.3 percent through the end of February and that returns were as good in the first two months of 2012 as they had been in 12 years.

headline.main: A Strong Start to 2012 for Hedge Funds
